channel.title: [req] how to make a spell different for another player?!?!?
channel.description:
how do i make a spell different for another player, i have tried this and it doesn't work, can someone help me?
[code] if(magicID == 1191 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Oblivion")) //Claws of guthix [/code]
and it doesn't work, can someone explain?
